title: Al Brown from Dangers
itunes:title: Al Brown from Dangers
description:
Episode 263 - Happy pre-Fourth of July for those US listeners. My guest this week is the vocalist from punk provocateurs Dangers, Al Brown. He’s also the man responsible for an amazing festival in the early 2000’s called Sink With Cali. We dove headfirst into teaching, the in’s and out’s of running a music festival and speaking your mind. It’s a really interesting insight to a person in the middle of people having strong opinions about who he is as a person. I loved the chat and hope you will to. The best suitcase you will EVER own. Our friends at Away want to give you $20 off your purchase. Try it for 100 days and if you don’t like it, they will give you a full refund.Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
